Hoonding, or Sword Singing is the state achieved by GrandMaster Swordsmen who have achieved the peak epitome of swordsmanship. Under Hoonding, whenever a swordsman carries any item, they can make it vibrate so much that it creates a gentle sing. In essence, any item that the GrandMaster Swordsman wield can become a sword and with it they can slash practically anything.

Sometimes also called Hoonding Warrior, these people are feared by many, even by those living in the [[Abyss]].
